name: Ball Maze
overview: The most basic of games. Find your way out of the maze but with a gravity-like twist, from the book "The Commodore 64 Games Book - 21 Sensational Games", which was published in German as "Das Commodore 64 Spiele-Buch - 21 raffinierte Spiele", in Finnish as "Commodore 64 Ohjelmoinnin opas - Pelit", and in Italian as "Il Libro dei Giochi del Commodore 64," Steer the ball through the maze from beginning to end, without letting it drop into one of the holes. It needs a steady hand and quick reactions but given a little practice it can be done. Controls use Z, X, ; and /.
